ComicInfo.Title: Lucy's Loophole; Be It Ever So Humble; Twinkle Thinkle; From the Drawing Board; Classic Peanuts Strips
ComicInfo.Summary: It's all PEANUTS, all the time! New stories, Schulz Sundays, and a can't-miss Lucy short that is guaranteed to put a smile on your face. One of the best all-ages comics on the stands, new and old fans alike agree that Peanuts is a must-read.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:15. [CVDB418861]
ComicInfo.Writer: Caleb Monroe, Charles M. Schulz, Nat Gertler
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Robert Pope, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Paige Braddock, Robert Pope
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alex Garner, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Snoopy
